timeline.bodyText:
Instead of the instanceof here, I think it's better to add a method to ProgramOptions for adding additional configuration. Something like (addToConfiguration(Configuration). On the base ProgramOptions this would do nothing but in PythonProgramOptions this would add the additional python configuration.
If we really want to do it nicely, though, we can even add the current code in this method here to the new ProgramOptions.addToConfiguration(). This way we treat everything the same.
